title: Windows 8.1 AIO 6in1 x86 x64 with Update May 2015
description:
*This release will not fit on a single-layer DVDR*
*Use a Dual-layer DVDR, Blu-Ray, or 8+GB UFD*

ashish.k presents Windows 8.1 AIO 6in1 x86 x64 with Update May2015
This image contains Windows Updates current to May12-2015

No Windows 8.1 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

Tools used:
dism for Image Exports
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1
Added Info folder to Windows Setup dir to annoy credit theives (murphy78)
murphy78 diskpart/apply script v1.2.6

Features:
-Resetbased starting images using preventpending to reduce release size
-NetFx 2-3.5.1 added to integration
-DaRT 8.1 integrated into boot.wim and winre.wim recovery options.
-Diskpart/apply script with recovery image and multi-boot support v1.2.6*
*To access, press shift-f10 during boot-setup and type: "MENU"
-Normal BIOS booting support for DVD-DL, UFD (NTFS only)
-No UEFI support as DVD source files are 32 bit only for AIO.

UPGRADE NOTE:
-No upgrades, clean install only.

**Installation instructions**:
Use "rufus" to create bootable USB.

To Activate using KMS, download the "Microsoft Toolkit 2.5.3" , run MTK, and select the EZ-Activator option. If you ever experience a problem with AutoKMS activation, because of an A/V program, switch to tap-adapter in the settings. It's more friendly with AV programs than the secohook method.

Credits:
CODYQX4 - MS Toolkit 2.5.3
murphy78 - Base ISO, Integration.
ashish.k - Creating AIO, Testing.

Enjoy,
ashish.k - KAT/TPB
